chinese: 求知若饥，虚心若愚。
english: Stay hungry, stay foolish.

chinese: 实现明天理想的唯一障碍是今天的疑虑。
english: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.

chinese: 成功不是终点，失败也并非末日，重要的是继续前进的勇气。
english: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

chinese: 相信自己能做到，你就已经成功了一半。
english: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

chinese: 敢想敢做，即使失败也无妨。
english: Dream big and dare to fail.

chinese: 行动是一切成功的基石。
english: Action is the foundational key to all success.

chinese: 当天赋不够努力时，努力会击败天赋。
english: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.

chinese: 让每一天都成为你的杰作。
english: Make each day your masterpiece.

chinese: 不要满足于平庸。
english: Never settle for mediocrity.

chinese: 有志者事竟成。
english: Where there is a will, there is a way.

chinese: 专注于旅程，而非终点。
english: Focus on the journey, not the destination.

chinese: 不吃苦中苦，难为人上人。
english: No pain, no gain.

chinese: 知识就是力量。
english: Knowledge is power.

chinese: 失败乃成功之母。
english: Failure is the mother of success.

chinese: 机遇总偏爱勇者。
english: Fortune favors the bold.

chinese: 每一次成就，都始于尝试的决定。
english: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.

chinese: 成功是每日小小努力的汇聚。
english: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.

chinese: 将伤痛化作智慧。
english: Turn your wounds into wisdom.

chinese: 杰出者有目标，平庸者只有愿望。
english: Great minds have purposes; others have wishes.

chinese: 瞄准月亮，即使错过，也能落在星辰。
english: Aim for the moon; even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.

chinese: 你的未来由今天的行动决定，而非明天。
english: Your future is created by what you do today, not tomorrow.

chinese: 自律是连接目标与成就的桥梁。
english: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.

chinese: 力量不来自胜利，而在于奋斗锻造。
english: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths.

chinese: 积少成多，聚沙成塔。
english: Little by little, a little becomes a lot.

chinese: 勇气不是没有恐惧，而是战胜恐惧。
english: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.

chinese: 不要等待铁热，再去锻打；要边打边将铁炼热。
english: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; make it hot by striking.

chinese: 我有一个梦想。
english: I have a dream.

chinese: 熟能生巧。
english: Practice makes perfect.

chinese: 卓越不是一次行动，而是一种习惯。
english: Excellence is not an act, but a habit.

chinese: 越努力，越幸运。
english: The harder you work, the luckier you get.

chinese: 坚持者终将成功。
english: Success belongs to the persevering.

chinese: 千里之行，始于足下。
english: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

chinese: 把握今天。
english: Carpe diem.

chinese: 时不我待。
english: Time waits for no one.

chinese: 不出手，你将错过百分之百的机会。
english: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.

chinese: 质量从不是偶然，而是智慧与努力的结果。
english: Quality is never an accident; it is always the result of intelligent effort.

chinese: 向星空进发。
english: Shoot for the stars.

chinese: 起身奋斗。
english: Rise and grind.

chinese: 目光锁定目标。
english: Eyes on the prize.

chinese: 面朝阳光，阴影自会落在身后。
english: Keep your face always toward the sunshine, and shadows will fall behind you.

chinese: 想象力比知识更重要。
english: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

chinese: 旅程的开始是思考，旅程的终点是行动。
english: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

chinese: 每一次失败都是成功的垫脚石。
english: Every failure is a stepping stone to success.

chinese: 不要害怕慢慢来，害怕的是停下来。
english: Don't be afraid to go slow, be afraid of stopping.

chinese: 成功的秘诀在于坚持自己的目标。
english: The secret of success is to persist in pursuing your goals.

chinese: 梦想不会逃跑，逃跑的永远是自己。
english: Dreams don't run away; it's you who runs away from them.

chinese: 每一天都是新的开始。
english: Every day is a new beginning.

chinese: 不经历风雨，怎能见彩虹？
english: Without experiencing the storm, how can you see the rainbow?

chinese: 生命不止，奋斗不息。
english: Life goes on, and so does the struggle.

chinese: 成功是努力的结果，而不是偶然的幸运。
english: Success is the result of hard work, not a stroke of luck.

chinese: 路虽远，行则将至。
english: Though the road is long, you will arrive as long as you travel it.

chinese: 不以山海为远，心之所向，无所不能。
english: No mountain or sea is too far when the heart is set.

chinese: 今日事，今日毕。
english: Do today's work today.

chinese: 星光不负赶路人，时光不负有心人。
english: The stars favor the travelers, and time favors the determined.

chinese: 志之所趋，无远弗届。
english: Where the will leads, no place is unreachable.

chinese: 滴水穿石，绳锯木断。
english: Dripping water penetrates stone; rope sawing can cut wood.

chinese: 行胜于言。
english: Action speaks louder than words.

chinese: 勤能补拙。
english: Diligence can make up for lack of talent.

chinese: 我思故我在。
english: I think, therefore I am.

chinese: 敢为天下先。
english: Dare to be the first.

chinese: 心有多大，舞台就有多大。
english: The bigger the heart, the larger the stage.

chinese: 无限风光在险峰。
english: The best view comes after the hardest climb.

chinese: 逆风飞翔，方显英雄本色。
english: Fly against the wind to show heroic spirit.

chinese: 破茧成蝶。
english: Break the cocoon to become a butterfly.

chinese: 敢于梦想，勇于实现。
english: Dare to dream and brave to achieve.

chinese: 点燃梦想，让梦想闪耀；梦想相伴，成功自来。
english: Ignite dreams and let dreams shine; with dreams at your side, success will follow.

chinese: 书写希望，让光芒闪耀；希望相伴，成功自来。
english: Write hope and let light shine; with hope at your side, success will follow.

chinese: 雕刻信念，让潜能闪耀；信念相伴，成功自来。
english: Carve faith and let potential shine; with faith at your side, success will follow.

chinese: 去追求让你内心燃烧起来的东西。
english: Go after what it is that creates meaning in your life and then trust yourself to handle the stress that follows.

chinese: 唯一真正的智慧在于知道自己一无所知。
english: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

chinese: 道可道，非常道；名可名，非常名。
english: The Tao that can be told is not the eternal Tao; the name that can be named is not the eternal name.

chinese: 激活蓝图，让信心闪耀；蓝图相伴，成功自来。
english: Activate blueprint and let confidence shine; with blueprint at your side, success will follow.

chinese: 长风破浪会有时，直挂云帆济沧海。
english: Sometime the winds and waves will rise; I'll set my cloudlike sail to cross the vast sea.

chinese: 会当凌绝顶，一览众山小。
english: I shall climb to the summit, where all other peaks seem small beneath me.

chinese: 莫等闲，白了少年头，空悲切。
english: Do not idle away your youth; regret grows when hair turns white.

chinese: 咬定青山不放松，立根原在破岩中。
english: Grip the green mountain without letting go; your roots lie deep in solid rock.

chinese: 千磨万击还坚劲，任尔东西南北风。
english: After thousands of grindings and hammerings, it remains firm; let the winds blow from every quarter.

chinese: 沉舟侧畔千帆过，病树前头万木春。
english: Beside the sunken ship a thousand sails pass by; before the dying tree ten thousand trees spring to life.

chinese: 不经一番寒彻骨，怎得梅花扑鼻香。
english: Without bone‑chilling cold, how could the plum blossom's fragrance be so piercing?

chinese: 天生我材必有用，千金散尽还复来。
english: Heaven made me for a purpose; squandered gold will return again.

chinese: 冰冻三尺，非一日之寒。
english: It takes more than one cold day for a river to freeze three feet deep.

chinese: 生当作人杰，死亦为鬼雄。
english: Alive, be a hero among men; dead, be a hero among spirits.

chinese: 不畏浮云遮望眼，自缘身在最高层。
english: Fear not the drifting clouds that dim your sight, for you stand on the highest height.

chinese: 老骥伏枥，志在千里；烈士暮年，壮心不已。
english: Though the old steed is stabled, it still aims for a thousand miles; heroes, even in twilight, keep their lofty hearts.

chinese: 男儿何不带吴钩，收取关山五十州。
english: Why should a man not gird his sword to reclaim the lost lands of fifty prefectures?

chinese: 读万卷书，行万里路。
english: Read ten thousand books and travel ten thousand miles.

chinese: 温故而知新，可以为师矣。
english: Reviewing the old as a means of realizing the new, one can be a teacher.

chinese: 青，取之于蓝而青于蓝；冰，水为之而寒于水。
english: Indigo comes from the blue plant yet is bluer than blue; ice is made of water yet colder than water.

chinese: 千淘万漉虽辛苦，吹尽狂沙始到金。
english: However arduous the countless siftings, only after the wild sand is blown away does gold emerge.

chinese: 路转峰回，云开见月明。
english: After winding paths and turning peaks, the clouds part and the moon shines bright.
